podu sathurata erehiwa samagi wemu | meghaya ← manapa kramaya ha baduna mithyawan rekha chithrawalata pata powa wikunana supiritharu → wasara kipayakata pera shrilankika siyalu dena kotiya namathi podu sathura erehiwa samagi wuha.rata karawu deshapalana nayakathwaya da, kotiyata srujuwama muhuna dun hamuda nayakathwaya da podu aramuna jayaganu pinisa eka wuha.ithihasaya thula kotiya paradawimata thibu awastha ihatha deparshawaye nogalapim nisa ahimi wu bawa api daka aththemu.prakata wadamarachchi satana ewan ek awasthawaki.namuth mewara ese wuye natha.militari nayakathwaya da deshapalana nayakathwaya da samaga mulu mahath ratema janathawa da kotiyata erehiwa eka kadawurakata gonu wuha.yuddha parajayen kotin raka ganimata uthsuka wu sulutharayak pamanak rajayata erehi kadawurakata gal wu namudu mbaawun ge hadata wada anek hada kipa gunayak prabala wuyen kotinge parajaya walakwimata mbaawunata haki wuye natha.
